structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Department Of The Attorney General, And The District Attorneys

law.catch_line: Persons Intruding On Land, Property Or Rights Of Commonwealth; Prosecution
law.text: He may, if in his judgment the public interest so requires, prosecute informations or other processes against persons who intrude on the land, rights or property of the commonwealth, or commit or erect a nuisance thereon.
